name: ANI Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: ANI Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a fully integrated specialty pharmaceutical company focused on developing, manufacturing, and marketing branded and generic prescription pharmaceutical products. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Baudette, Minnesota, ANI Pharmaceuticals strives to deliver high-quality medications to patients while maintaining a commitment to innovation and excellence in the pharmaceutical industry. The company specializes in niche pharmaceutical products, with a diverse portfolio that includes oral solid dosage forms, injectables, and complex products. ANI's proprietary and partnered products target various therapeutic areas, including pain management, oncology, and other critical health conditions. The company employs advanced manufacturing techniques and adheres to stringent quality control standards to ensure the safety and efficacy of its products. ANI Pharmaceuticals is also engaged in the development of new drug formulations and delivery systems, which positions it well within a highly competitive market. With a focus on leveraging its core competencies and expanding its product offerings, ANI continues to explore growth opportunities through strategic partnerships and acquisitions. The company's mission is to improve patient outcomes and enhance the quality of life for individuals through the introduction of innovative therapies.

faq.answer: ANI Pharmaceuticals focuses on developing, manufacturing, and marketing branded and generic prescription pharmaceutical products.

faq.answer: Arthur S. Przybyl is the CEO of ANI Pharmaceuticals, Inc.

faq.answer: ANI Pharmaceuticals is headquartered in Baudette, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does ANI Pharmaceuticals offer?
faq.answer: ANI Pharmaceuticals offers branded and generic pharmaceuticals, including oral solid dosage forms and injectables.
